abstract: German authorities say Turkish man, under investigation for alleged drug dealing, died when his car exploded in western Berlin; link blast to organized crime, rather than terrorism.
lead_paragraph: The police linked the explosion, which killed a Turkish man, to organized crime, and prosecutors said there was no connection to terrorism.

headline.main: Blast Kills Driver of Car in Berlin, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Europe; Germany: Blast Kills Driver of Car in Berlin, Police Say

snippet: The police linked the explosion, which killed a Turkish man, to organized crime, and prosecutors said there was no connection to terrorism.
